INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_bank_account( order_no, ping_id, pay_date, pay_amount, pay_channel, pay_remark, create_date, group_flag )
SELECT #{e.orderNo}, #{e.pingId}, #{e.payDate}, TRUNCATE(#{e.payAmount},2), #{e.payChannel}, #{e.payRemark}, SYSDATE(), DATE_FORMAT(#{e.payDate},'%Y%m%d') FROM dual
mapper.select:
SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, b.order_no AS orderNo, b.pay_date AS payDate, b.pay_amount AS payAmount, b.pay_channel AS payChannel, b.group_flag AS groupFlag, c.user_id AS userId, c.nickname AS nickname, c.mobile AS mobile, a.order_amount AS orderAmount, a.consignee AS consignee, a.mobile AS mobile1, a.address AS address, a.is_real as isReal FROM mtmydb.mtmy_orders a RIGHT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_bank_account b ON b.order_no = a.temp_orderId LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users c ON c.user_id = a.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND b.order_no = #{orderNo}
AND b.group_flag = #{groupFlag}
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{starttime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{overtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY a.order_id

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, b.order_no AS orderNo, b.pay_date AS payDate, b.pay_amount AS payAmount, b.pay_channel AS payChannel, b.group_flag AS groupFlag, c.user_id AS userId, c.nickname AS nickname, c.mobile AS mobile, d.goods_id AS goodsId, d.goods_sn AS goodsSn, d.goods_num AS goodsNum, d.goods_name AS goodsName, d.spec_key_name AS specKeyName, d.goods_price AS goodsPrice, a.order_amount AS orderAmount, a.consignee AS consignee, a.mobile AS mobile1, a.address AS address, (SELECT bar_code FROM mtmydb.mtmy_spec_goods_price WHERE spec_key = d.spec_key AND goods_id = d.goods_id AND del_flag = 0) AS barCode, (SELECT goods_no FROM mtmydb.mtmy_spec_goods_price WHERE spec_key = d.spec_key AND goods_id = d.goods_id AND del_flag = 0) AS goodsNo, ( SELECT o3.`name` FROM sys_office_info o1 LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o1.id = o2.id LEFT JOIN sys_office o3 ON o3.id = o2.parent_id WHERE o1.store_phone = a.mobile AND o2.`name` = a.consignee ) AS officeName, a.add_time AS addTime, a.shipping_code AS shippingCode, a.shipping_name AS shippingName, a.shipping_time AS shippingTime, a.user_note AS userNote, a.admin_note AS adminNote FROM mtmydb.mtmy_orders a RIGHT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_bank_account b ON b.order_no = a.temp_orderId LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users c ON c.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping d ON d.order_id = a.order_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND b.order_no = #{orderNo}
AND b.group_flag = #{groupFlag}
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{starttime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{overtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY a.order_id
select COUNT(order_no) from mtmydb.mtmy_bank_account WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
select DISTINCT(group_flag) AS groupFlag from mtmydb.mtmy_bank_account ORDER BY group_flag desc
